HOME.TITLE: Misqui: Fun Skill Learning for Kids—Chess, Math, Logic & More
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Misqui makes learning fun for kids. Explore engaging modules in math, logic, chess, English, and more—tailored for young learners with gamified progression.

LEARN.TITLE: Your Learning Dashboard | Misqui
LEARN.DESCRIPTION: Track progress, pick up where you left off, and explore new challenges—all in your personalized Misqui dashboard.

DRILL.DESCRIPTION: Practice drills designed to reinforce key concepts, unit by unit, across every course—tailored for effective learning and long-term retention.

LEADERBOARD.TITLE: Leaderboard | Misqui
LEADERBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Celebrate your progress and see how you stack up against other young learners. Climb the ranks by completing drills, unlocking achievements, and earning stars.

MISSIONS.TITLE: Missions | Misqui
MISSIONS.DESCRIPTION: Complete fun daily and weekly missions to stay motivated, earn rewards, and build smart learning habits—all while having a blast!

STORE.TITLE: Store | Misqui
STORE.DESCRIPTION: Exchange points for extra gems or go pro for unlimited gems.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings | Misqui
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Manage your account settings, preferences, and notifications.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills Library | Misqui
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Discover skill-based learning paths in math, chess, sudoku, logic, and language. Designed for kids to learn at their pace while having fun.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service | Misqui
TERMS.DESCRIPTION: Review Misqui’s terms of service to understand your rights and responsibilities while using our platform.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy | Misqui
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Learn how Misqui collects, uses, and protects your data—and your rights regarding privacy.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us | Misqui
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Learn more about Misqui’s mission to make skill learning fun and effective for children through gamification and thoughtful design.

PRICING.TITLE: Pricing | Misqui
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: Access many modules for free, or unlock deeper features with affordable one-time purchases. No subscriptions—ever.
